name: careXpert
description: CareXpert is a full-stack telehealth platform where patients can check symptoms using AI, book doctor appointments, and chat in real-time. Doctors manage appointments, view histories, and issue prescriptions. It features real-time chat and an ML-powered symptom checker for a seamless healthcare experience.
features: AI-powered symptom checker with urgency level suggestions
Appointment booking with doctor filtering by specialty and availability
Doctor dashboard for managing appointments and prescriptions
Secure JWT-based authentication for patients and doctors
